Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterFAQWasThisArticleHelpful
Setting.Description: Output filter to add "Was this article helpful" at the end of FAQ Articles.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterVerifyOpenTickets
Setting.Description: Output filter to add "Was this article helpful" at the end of FAQ Articles.

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###Enabled
Setting.Description: Select if you want to show buttons or links on Was this article helpful

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###OptionsWhenBrowsing
Setting.Description: Configure here the link of each option when user reach FAQ Article browsing the service catalog. Please specify the order using "0:", "1:" on key field

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###OptionsWhenSearching
Setting.Description: Configure here the link of each option when user reach FAQ Article using search box or on FAQ navigation

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###SelfAnsweredTicketAttributes
Setting.Description: Configure here Attributes for Self Answered tickets creation. You can use these tags _CustomerUser_, _CustomerID_, _FAQTitle_, _FAQID_, _Service_, _ServiceID_. You can send and use also _CustomParam0_ to _CustomParam9_

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###SelfAnsweredTicketDynamicFields
Setting.Description: Configure here the DynamicFields we should set after ticket creation. You can use these tags _CustomerUser_, _CustomerID_, _FAQTitle_, _FAQID_, _Service_, _ServiceID_. You can send and use also _CustomParam0_ to _CustomParam9_

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###SelfAnsweredArticle
Setting.Description: Configure here Attributes for Self Answered tickets first article creation. You can use these tags _CustomerUser_, _CustomerID_, _FAQID, _FAQTitle_, _Service_, _ServiceID_. You can send and use also _CustomParam0_ to _CustomParam9_

Setting.Name: ServiceCatalog###ServiceArticleDescriptionField
Setting.Description: FAQ Article Field to be used as Description for Service Articles

Setting.Name: WasThisArticleHelpful###WasThisArticleHelpfulText
Setting.Description: Text for "Was This Article Helpful Text" FAQ articles footer

Setting.Name: LinkObject::Type###ServiceArticle
Setting.Description: This setting defines the link type 'Service Article'. If the source name and the target name contain the same value, the resulting link is a non-directional one. If the values are different, the resulting link is a directional link.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::Type###ServiceDescriptionArticle
Setting.Description: This setting defines the link type 'Service Description Article'. If the source name and the target name contain the same value, the resulting link is a non-directional one. If the values are different, the resulting link is a directional link.

Hash.Item: Service Description - It's shown on customer interface

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterLigeroServiceCatalogAdminService
Setting.Description: Add DynamicField treatment on Admin Service screen.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerServiceCatalog
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::CustomerServiceCatalog###002-LigeroServiceCatalog
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ServiceCatalog###CategoryCssOnMousehover
Setting.Description: Set CSS in Category when mouse hover.Fill this field with CSS Code.

Setting.Name: ServiceCatalog::CharLimiteSizeDescription
Setting.Description: Define limit character to description of service

Setting.Name: ServiceCatalog::SplitFirstLvl
Setting.Description: If this option is set to 'Yes', first lvl will be not showed. If this option is set to 'No', first lv will be showed.

Hash.Item: Somente um chamado aberto por vez por usurio
